医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的人工智能模型 BiomedGPT 将改变医疗和研究实践一张图片可能胜过一千个字，但是……他们还有很多工作要做才能赶上 BiomedGPT。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-AI-model-BiomedGPT-set-to-transform-medical-and-research-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-AI-model-BiomedGPT-set-to-transform-medical-and-research-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=173a36c6-e75c-459e-8c62-dfb089ed2fd9 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 21:43:48 -0500 New AI model BiomedGPT set to transform medical and research practices
怀孕期间接触阻燃剂可能会影响儿童肥胖风险根据环境影响儿童健康结果资助的一项新研究，怀孕期间接触有机磷酸酯（OPE）——使用塑料和阻燃剂的日常产品中发现的化学物质——可能对儿童肥胖风险产生不同的影响。 ECHO）美国国立卫生研究院的项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Exposure-to-flame-tropics-during-pregnancy-may-affect-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Exposure-to-flame-tropics-during-pregnancy-may-affect-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c265dcf4-bbf4-4843-8429-b24ef2674d67 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 21:40:15 -0500 Exposure to flame retardants during pregnancy may affect childhood obesity risk
巴罗研究人员首次展示安德里亚·维萨里的解剖模型凤凰城巴罗神经学研究所的研究人员首次收集并展示了 16 世纪解剖学家安德里亚·维萨里 (Andrea Vesalius) 近 500 年前发表的“人体模型”，这些作品为现代外科和神经外科培训奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Barrow-researchers-display-Andrea-Vesalius-anatomical-manikins-for-the-first-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Barrow-researchers-display-Andrea-Vesalius-anatomical-manikins-for-the-first-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fd8d3e6-7be6-467b-ae36-390905345a54 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 21:36:19 -0500 Barrow researchers display Andrea Vesalius' anatomical manikins for the first time
通过基因筛选确定治疗胶质母细胞瘤的新靶点由多伦多大学研究人员领导的一个团队发现了新的目标，这可能是有效治疗胶质母细胞瘤（一种致命的脑癌）的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-targets-identified-for-treating-glioblastoma-through-genic-screen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-targets-identified-for-treating-glioblastoma-through-genic-screen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75692fb1-2f1d-4663-baee-ac440b51ec58 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 21:31:16 -0500 New targets identified for treating glioblastoma through genetic screen
通过自然对齐方法改善膝关节置换手术的效果在进行膝关节置换手术（也称为全膝关节置换术）时，传统上医生会尝试将髋部、膝部和踝部对齐在一条直线上，形成中立对齐，而不是复制患者原来的对齐方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Knee-replacement-surgery-outcomes-improve-with-native-alignment-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Knee-replacement-surgery-outcomes-improve-with-native-alignment-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c652158-47e4-4745-b699-bdb9280fc768 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 20:38:47 -0500 Knee replacement surgery outcomes improve with native alignment approach
科学家开发出可以构建细胞内结构的合成基因来自加州大学洛杉矶分校萨穆埃利工程学院和意大利罗马托尔维加塔大学的研究人员开发出了合成基因，其功能类似于活细胞中的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-develop-synthetic-genes-that-c​​an-build-intracellular-structs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-develop-synthetic-genes-that-c​​an-build-intracellular-structs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b49529-fbdf-469b-a83c-56ef16b00939 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 20:30:33 -0500 Scientists develop synthetic genes that can build intracellular structures
科学家鉴定出人类触觉的16种神经细胞科学家在一项关于人类触觉的新研究中发现了至少 16 种不同类型的神经细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-identify-16-types-of-nerve-cells-in- human-sense-of-touch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-identify-16-types-of-nerve-cells-in- human-sense-of-touch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8838f203-a495-4ea3-9ff3-ebf223377b47 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 20:23:07 -0500 Scientists identify 16 types of nerve cells in human sense of touch
铁和维生素 D 可降低抑郁风险，而硒和镁会增加抑郁风险研究人员利用孟德尔随机化方法探索微量营养素摄入与抑郁症之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Iron-and-vitamin-D-reduce-depression-risk-while-selenium-and-magnesium-raise-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Iron-and-vitamin-D-reduce-depression-risk-while-selenium-and-magnesium-raise-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95d52ab4-fe41-415e-bf28-fa3dc64d25f4 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 19:51:00 -0500 Iron and vitamin D reduce depression risk, while selenium and magnesium raise it
加拿大的积极政策比美国更有效地减少药品短缺加拿大与药品相关的供应链问题导致严重药品短缺的可能性比美国低 40%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Canadae28099s-proactive-policies-reduce-drug-shortages-far-more-efficiently-than-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Canadae28099s-proactive-policies-reduce-drug-shortages-far-more-efficiently-than-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c783d7-3874-4415-a698-a445622c60a5 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 19:23:00 -0500 Canada’s proactive policies reduce drug shortages far more effectively than the U.S.
对早期亨廷顿病机制的新见解研究人员发现谷胱甘肽-抗坏血酸代谢受损与亨廷顿病早期多巴胺增加之间存在联系，表明 GSTO2 是控制运动功能障碍的潜在治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-insights-into-early-Huntingtons-disease-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-insights-into-early-Huntingtons-disease-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9731b7d8-d8dd-452d-a2c0-cb304f775a35 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 19:09:00 -0500 New insights into early Huntington's disease mechanisms
